courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: Fundamental concepts of computer science and programming with Python. Topics include algorithms, data structures, and basic software engineering principles.

courses.title: Linear Algebra
courses.description: Advanced linear algebra and matrix theory, covering vector spaces, linear transformations, eigenvalues, and applications to computer graphics.

courses.title: Quantum Mechanics
courses.description: Introduction to quantum mechanics, wave functions, Schr√∂dinger equation, and applications to modern physics.

courses.title: Molecular Biology
courses.description: Advanced study of molecular biology, including DNA structure, protein synthesis, and cellular processes.

notes.title: Introduction to Python Programming
notes.content: Essential Python concepts including variables, control structures, and functions. Code examples and practice problems included.

notes.title: Matrix Operations and Transformations
notes.content: Comprehensive guide to matrix operations, including multiplication, inversion, and eigenvalue calculations.

notes.title: Wave Functions and Probability
notes.content: Detailed explanation of wave functions, probability densities, and their applications in quantum systems.

notes.title: DNA Replication Process
notes.content: Step-by-step breakdown of DNA replication, including key enzymes and cellular mechanisms.
